pr_title: [CDAP-16539] Honor empty values set by user for plugin properties not to be overwritten by defaults set in widget json

timeline.author: njbriggs

timeline.message: [CDAP-16539] Fixes plugin properties UI to honor user\'s choice of empty values even if there is a default
Adds e2e to pipeline studio spec validating empty values set by user is retained
Adds e2e to pipeline studio spec validating empty values set by user is retained
